attributes.action: Guarantee there will be no Service Act/s in the event of a global conflict.
attributes.additional_details: In the event of a global conflict, the British public don't want to fight a war that will lead to, at worst, the end of human civilisation as we know it. Governments have become evermore complicit in pushing their citizens to fight these futile wars. Have we not learned from the First World War or Second World War?
attributes.background: Ensure that no Military Service Acts are passed in the event of global conflict involving the United Kingdom and her allies.

rejection.details:
Petitions also need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government has not announced any plans to introduce conscription, so we're not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do.
